https://studio.code.org/p/artist.short_instructions: Draw something awesome! Your code is saved as a project that you can return to at any time.

callouts.New Artist Project_callout1: Click the categories to see the blocks in your toolbox! Drag blocks to the workspace to add them to your program
callouts.New Artist Project_callout2: Hit "Run" to save and run your program
callouts.sign_in_to_save_project: Want to access your project later? Sign in to save this project to your account!

authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_13_Cole_a: Try having the Agent build some bridges so that Alex or Steve can walk around beyond the edges of the map.

https://studio.code.org/p/bounce.short_instructions: Create your own Bounce game. You can change all the visuals and the rules. When you're done, click Share to let friends try your game on their phones.

https://studio.code.org/p/sports.short_instructions: Create your own game! You're in charge here: you can change all the rules, mix and match sports, get creative! When you're done, click Finish to let friends try your game on their phones.

https://studio.code.org/p/basketball.short_instructions: Create your own Basketball game. You can change all the rules. When you're done, click Share to let friends try your game on their phones.
